actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to convey certain real property for use as a permanent site for the Air Force Enlisted Men's Widow's and Dependent's Home.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Air Force to convey certain real property for use as a permanent site for the Air Force Enlisted Men's Widow's and Dependent's Home.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Air Force to convey certain real property for use as a permanent site for the Air Force Enlisted Men's Widow's and Dependent's Home.
